EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-07-20
EmailTemplate.subject: How Pivotal Works with GE and the Air Force
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
JULY 20, 2017 <[[https://pivotal.io/customers/ge?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> GE Embraces Its Future as a Digital Industrial Leader Learn how GE's Predix, built on Pivotal Cloud Foundry and Pivotal Greenplum, helps San Diego become a smart city. Find Out More <[[https://pivotal.io/customers/ge?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/coding-the-resistance-9a597c3c2661?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Coding the Resistance As political discourse and civil engagement expand worldwide, software is playing an ever-increasing role. Neal Ungerleider explores this phenomenon and the driving forces behind it in a post for Built to Adapt. Read Now <[[https://builttoadapt.io/coding-the-resistance-9a597c3c2661?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/checkpoint/wp/2017/07/19/the-pentagon-has-tried-to-get-silicon-valley-on-its-side-for-years-now-its-part-of-the-air-war-against-isis/?utm_term=.892168e8dc98]]> How Silicon Valley Has Become Part of the Air War Against ISIS This Washington Post article captures how Pivotal has helped the Air Force retool how they refuel aircrafts involved in the fight against ISIS. Check it out <[[https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/checkpoint/wp/2017/07/19/the-pentagon-has-tried-to-get-silicon-valley-on-its-side-for-years-now-its-part-of-the-air-war-against-isis/?utm_term=.0771078d6014]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-banner&utm_campaign=s1p-registration]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-microsoft-azure-consumption-partner-of-the-year?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Pivotal Named Azure Partner of the Year Amid 16,000 partners at Microsoft's MS Inspire conference, Pivotal was named Partner of the Year for Azure consumption by US Enterprise customers. Why We Won <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-microsoft-azure-consumption-partner-of-the-year?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/through-the-looking-glass-designing-alice-for-women-users-f630b752d749?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Through The Looking Glass: Designing Alice For Women Find out how Circular Board used Pivotal’s processes to build Alice, a machine-learning, digital startup advisor to women. Check it Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/how-to-deliver-an-event-driven-architecture?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://techcrunch.com/2017/07/18/rackspace-partners-with-pivotal-to-launch-managed-services-for-cloud-foundry/]]> Rackspace Partners With Pivotal to Launch Managed Services for Cloud Foundry Rackspace will help enterprises that run Pivotal Cloud Foundry manage their deployments, no matter whether they are running them in a public or private cloud. More on This Partnership <[[https://techcrunch.com/2017/07/18/rackspace-partners-with-pivotal-to-launch-managed-services-for-cloud-foundry/]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/the-fat-baby-in-the-water-cloud-native-enterprise-architecture-ep-72?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> The Fat Baby in the Water (Ep. 72) In this episode of Pivotal Conversations, Coté discusses his research so far into figuring out how "traditional" enterprise architects could and should figure into cloud-native think. Listen and Subscribe <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/the-fat-baby-in-the-water-cloud-native-enterprise-architecture-ep-72?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 7/25 Cloud-Native Roadshow, Dallas <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/dallas?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-dallas]]>
7/25 Developers Can Design Too!, Atlanta <[[https://www.meetup.com/Lean-Software-Atlanta/events/240971027/]]>
7/26 Webinar: Which Application Modernization Pattern Is Right For You? <[[https://pages.apigee.com/2017-07-26-Webcast-Pivotal-App-Modernization-Simplified-reg.html?utm_source=pivotal]]>
7/27 Cloud-Native Roadshow, Denver <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/denver?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=newsletter]]>
8/1 Pivotal Analytics Roadshow, Detroit <[[https://www.meetup.com/PivotalSydney-Tech-Talks/events/241083943/]]>
Check Out Upcoming Pivotal Training Courses <[[http://info.pivotal.io/UPBY0aJ0NU0ICz02nA030DG]]>
